name: Ipad Service Holder
description: Prospective Ipad Service Holder. This case is a perfect fit for protecting your Ipad. It is also a perfect fit for Service and your magazines. It is available in Black or Brown. It is 5 oz vegetable tan leather and hand sewn. It is Available Now! The size is 11" x 9" and is available with a front or back pocket.

name: 100% Handmade Leather Cardholder
description:
This one of a kind leather cardholder is ideal for the business person, the aspiring entrepreneur or your mother in law. (Mine really likes hers.) So basically if you need something stylish to hold your cards the Prospective 100% Handmade Leather Cardholder is perfect for you. 

NO MACHINES WERE USED DURING THE ENTIRE PROCESS.

We are working to save electricity and create artistic hand crafted products. Our wallet is 100% vegetable tanned leather and is sewn with a needle and high quality waxed nylon thread.

It is 4.25" by 2.5" and fits normal sized business cards and credit cards.

The Prospective Handmade Leather Cardholder is available in Brown or Black.

name: 100% Handmade Leather Wallet
description:
The Prospective Handmade Leather Wallet is one of a kind. The wallet was made 100% by hand. Hand cut, hand stained, hand sewn, hand finished and hand polished. NO MACHINES WERE USED DURING THE ENTIRE PROCESS.

We are working to save electricity and create artistic hand crafted products. Our wallet is 100% vegetable tanned leather and is sewn with a needle and high quality waxed nylon thread.

The Prospective Handmade Leather Wallet is available in Brown or Black.

name: Leather Camera Strap
description:
These cool camera straps can complement any camera. The question you have to ask yourself is how much attention do you want? People will constantly be complementing you on your awesome straps. (We don't mind... just tell them you got them from us.)

These camera straps are 100% handmade and 100% real leather.

There are two styles to choose from:

The Braid: Stylish leather strap with a piece of leather braided through to attach to your camera.
The Rings: Two heavy duty pieces of leather sewn together with two reinforced steel rings to connect to your camera.

The camera straps are made to order, so for any customization contact us before you purchase for more details.

name: Leather Expedition Travel Bag
description:
If Indiana Jones, James Bond or the Dos Equis Guy had to choose a high quality travel bag they would choose the Prospective Expedition Travel Bag.

It is made of 100% heavy duty 4 to 5 ounce leather. It has a combination of hand stitching, industrial machine sewing and heavy duty rivets, along with reinforced buckles and rings. The bag is lined with easy to clean pig skin. The shoulder strap is removable and fully adjustable. The 2 belts that close the bag are removable and can be used as a belt to hold up your pants. (Waists measuring 30" to 40")

The bag measures 14" wide by 12" tall by 6" deep. The inside dimensions are 13.5" wide by 11.75" tall by 5.75" deep.

The bag comes with an external and internal pocket.
There is an optional removable camera protection insert available.

The Expedition Travel Bag is made to order, so for any customization contact us before you purchase for more details.

options.name: Expedition Travel Bag with Camera Protection Insert
